content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Manchester City 5.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Manchester City 5.
Attempt saved. Yossi Benayoun (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross.
Attempt saved. Yossi Benayoun (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Mata with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Milner with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 5. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Hand ball by Yossi Benayoun (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Ramires (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fernando Torres.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 4. Juan Mata (Chelsea) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jack Rodwell (Manchester City).
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ramires (Chelsea).
Abdul Razak (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by John Obi Mikel (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Manchester City 4. Samir Nasri (Manchester City) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Richard Wright.
Demba Ba (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Attempt blocked. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Samir Nasri with a through ball.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Manchester City 3. Ramires (Chelsea) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fernando Torres with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Fernando Torres.
Substitution, Chelsea. Yossi Benayoun replaces Oscar.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. James Milner (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jack Rodwell.
Maicon (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by John Obi Mikel (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Juan Mata replaces David Luiz.
Foul by Edin Dzeko (Manchester City).

Substitution, Manchester City. Javi García replaces Dedryck Boyata.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Manchester City 3. James Milner (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Offside, Manchester City. Samir Nasri tries a through ball, but Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Demba Ba.
Attempt saved. Ramires (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Demba Ba.
Attempt missed. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

Attempt missed. David Luiz (Chelsea) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is high and wide to the left from a direct free kick.
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Dedryck Boyata (Manchester City).
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Manchester City 2. Ramires (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by David Luiz.
Fernando Torres (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Abdul Razak (Manchester City).
Substitution, Manchester City. James Milner replaces David Silva.
Substitution, Manchester City. Richard Wright replaces Joe Hart.
Substitution, Manchester City. Maicon replaces Pablo Zabaleta.
Substitution, Manchester City. Joleon Lescott replaces Vincent Kompany.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jack Rodwell replaces Carlos Tévez.
Substitution, Manchester City. Abdul Razak replaces Sergio Agüero.
Substitution, Chelsea. Petr Cech replaces Henrique Hilario.
Substitution, Manchester City. Edin Dzeko replaces Yaya Touré.
Second Half begins Chelsea 0, Manchester City 2.
First Half ends, Chelsea 0, Manchester City 2.
